title: Her name was Bitter: A Memoir
description: The true account of a child's decade long ordeal with a fugitive on the run. Years of incest that lead to a pregnancy at 13. The trauma of giving birth in secret, being forced to give her daughter up for adoption, and coping with the shame of protecting the guilty. A glimpse into the life of a victim and a victor. Explore a young girlâ€™s journey from utter chaos to an unlikely destination of peace.
author: Mara D. Johnson
